channel.title: Image Tool Commands :: WebLogic Image Tool
channel.description: Learn about the commands supported by the Image Tool.

item.title: Create Image
item.description: The create command creates a new container image and installs the requested Java and WebLogic software.

item.title: Create Auxiliary Image
item.description: The createAuxImage command creates a new container image with WDT install and optional models, archives, and variables files.

item.title: Rebase Image
item.description: The rebase command creates a new container image using an existing WebLogic domain from an existing image.

item.title: Update Image
item.description: The update command creates a new container image by applying WebLogic patches to an existing image.

item.title: Inspect Image
item.description: The inspect command reports on the contents of a container image.

item.title: Cache
item.description: The Image Tool maintains metadata on the local file system for patches and installers. You can use the cache command to manipulate the local metadata.
